app_detail:
ğŸ”± Digital compass for Android is an irreplaceable tool if you plan on hiking, camping, travel or boating. You can find your way easily through the best compass app. When travel or lost your way then check your direction by smart compass for Android.

ğŸ”± Digital compass is a tool to search bearings(azimuth) using the built-in magnetic sensors and compass's smooth and natural rotation is looks like real compass. It's the most precise of all compass app and supports high definition displays.
Download Digital Compass for Android 2019 now

ğŸ”” Digital compass for Android has 3 significant features below. ğŸ””
â­ Digital compass for android is GPS compass free, starts fast and simply to use it. Smart compass app is the most accurate and useful app for navigation and orientation purpose that shows directions based on built-in magnetic sensor. 
â­ Smart compass is a real compass, which shows deviceâ€™s real-time orientation to magnetic fields and true north. Digital compass shows direction relative to the geographic cardinal directions, with true and magnetic North, south, east, and west coordinates, gps and map that makes navigating your world faster and easier.
â­ Smart compass for Android takes advantage of GPS compass and GPS and Google Map to get your position on Earth, and obtains map information near your location using Google Map and GPS locator. A digital compass can be used for most of your outdoor activities such as travel, picnics, camping, hiking or boating. 

ğŸ”” Features: ğŸ””
- Simple to use, use it like a real compass
- Professional design
- Ability to switch between true and magnetic true north.
- Magnetic and true north are available, the app automatically takes care of variation.
- Display horizontal level
- Display device slope
- Display magnetic field strength
- Display true heading
- Display latitude, longitude
- Display current location
- Incredibly smooth movements
- GPS Map and Google Map.
- Standard, Satellite, Terrain, Hybrid modes.
- Location and distance tracking.
- Show calibration notification
- Show weather
- It's compass free

ğŸ”” Note 
To use gps compass, hold your Android device flat, use just like a real compass. Your device must have magnetic sensor inside to read earth magnetic field. If your device does not have magnetic sensor compass app will not work. Please don't write bad comments, it's not our fault!

ğŸ”” Support ğŸ””
If you have any problems installing or using the application, please contact the team developed applications via mail e-mail: icelifemobile@gmail.com . We will contact you and solve theproblem as soon as possible.
